BasicInfo.short: A platform for fast and easy access to satellite imagery. Optimizing the way you bring information of the changing planet into your work.

Products.name: Landmapper imagery data
Products.description: Flying 30 satellites and two sensor configurations, Landmapper captures both daily coverage and high resolution shots of our planet.

Products.name: Astro Digital API
Products.description: Open APIs for Satellite Imagery. We're building an imagery processing pipeline that streams real-time imagery to your application.
